website_summaries.verdict: A great product for the money, especially if you do not mind investing in your own thermometer to watch temps.
pros: Does not require a lot of checking in during smoking
Wood tray can take wood chunks instead of just chips
cons: The temperature gauge on the door is not very useful

customer_reviews.title: Won't be using for long.
customer_reviews.text: Before we bought this smoker, we read some posts online about how people made smokers out of filing cabinets. The Smoke Vault *is* basically like a file cabinet with a burner. It doesn't retain or manage heat very well. To smoke something really properly you need to maintain certain temperatures, so this isn't it. (If you don't think this is important, then you may be fine with this.) We'll have to get something more serious eventually, but this was a learning experience.
customer_reviews.author: °K.S.°

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker for the weekend enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: This is the first smoker I've ever used, and it did not disappoint. Was easy enough to assemble with the instructions provided. Firing it up for the first time was also very easy. The thermometer on the front of the unit seemed fairly accurate the first use, but the second use my ThermoPro was reading about 30°F different. With that being said I wouldn't rely solely on the door thermometer. Plus the dual read ThermoPro makes everything so much easier. The temperature control is very consistent, but it's not easy to dial it to an exact temperature, which is really my only complaint with this. I would highly recommend for a first time BBQ'r. Can't beat this for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Z3U5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners, great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for his birthday. Took him a month to finally get around to setting it up. He’s obsessed with it. He’s smoked fish and a pork butt so far , but he mentioned using it on Christmas. He said it took a while to set up but it’s easy if u follow directions. Bought a digital meat thermometer, jack daniels pellets are the best for meat, n he used apple pellets for the fish. I’d definitely recommend, and as a first time smoker user he’s very happy.
customer_reviews.author: April Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Temperature is Very Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Long story short it works but the temperature is very inaccurate. As you can see from my picture the smoker reads about 185 but the more accurate digital thermometer is reading 241. The probe is placed just behind the thermometer on the door. Also i just validated the accuracy of the digital with my oven and it's spot on.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not an electric, you need to monitor the temps. When you adjust the temps,open the door and watch the flame, a little adjustment goes a long way. Practice with something forgiving for your first few times, get a feel for it and how it works. Only reason it didn't get 5 is that one of my racks has a minor flaw and the chip pan warped slightly with first use. This is just knit picking, best smoker I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: It's a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Its solid. I like the pan that holds the wood.it should last, since its built rugged. The water pan holds lots of water, and isn't flimsy. The assembly took about an hour, but the good thing id of course that you only have to do it once, then you get to enjoy you smoker. It should last a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain M.

customer_reviews.title: very well made, even smoking without much heat
customer_reviews.text: Camp chef really gives you more bang for the buck and makes a great product. Smoking plate is very thick and will last a long time.the other components are also well made. Thermometer numbers are a bit small and hard to see, especially with smoker smokin". Good even smoke with out too much heat. Cant say that about many other smokers in this class. The camp chef cover is important if you want the smoker to last. It matches the other camp chef covers so it is a nice look on this smoker, but is too small/short.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: My Second One
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I have a Green Egg and just never use it because this thing is so much better. CONNECTS TO NATURAL GAS TOO! another bonus. YOU CAN COLD SMOKE in it with a LIZZQ Premium Pellet Smoker Tube. Had another one for 15 years - gave it to my daughter and bought another one. You won't go wrong with this smoker!
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than I thought it would. Not huge but big enough for four slabs of ribs or 2-3 chickens easily. Held nicely at 225 for 5 hours without messing around with it. (although I converted it to natural gas so it burns a little cooler) I've read complaints about smoke leaking out the door but if you put it together properly you won't see that at all. The door latch has two nuts; if you crank down the inner nut with a socket until it's very snug then the door seals tightly. If you put it together like a monkey....then yes, it will leak badly.
customer_reviews.author: NedNutritious

customer_reviews.title: begginer choice .. and for the dollars spent .. absolute winner ..!!
customer_reviews.text: temperature easy to control there are 4 options : warm , high , medium , and low .. heavy gauge chips fan .. combination water and grease fan .. built in thermometer read the temperature from inside that heat created from outside temperature , variable .. not a problem .. bought a two probes digital wireless problem solved ... all parts came in great shape .. all the holes aligned properly makes it easy to assemble .. less than 30 minutes with initial burn for 5 minutes, all heat control variables functioned properly .. Note: always smell gas odor before igniting safety save life .. the packing are great no dent on the unit ..
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel Gozon

customer_reviews.title: make a few modified adjustments on the vents so they would close better. no problem keeping the heat on low
customer_reviews.text: I really have been enjoying this smoker. make a few modified adjustments on the vents so they would close better. no problem keeping the heat on low . would buy one again. decided to just smoke stuff first in a throw away foil pan to keep the mess out of smoker so clean up is just removing the ashes and closing the door..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When figured out was happy
customer_reviews.text: States that comes with recipes. Did not. Also does not give good instructions on how to use properly
customer_reviews.author: Susan Leach

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level unit
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is amazing as an entry level unit doesn’t require a lot of effort however you may need to do some slight modifications insulating the door and the temp gauge isn’t that accurate
customer_reviews.author: INFORMED CONSUMER

customer_reviews.title: Hope you never need parts
customer_reviews.text: I like the smoker, however couple problems. at very low temps the burner will blow out. The larger problem I have, if you use your smoker a lot and need any replacement parts, the company who produces them is almost always out of stock on the most commonly needed parts (water tray).
customer_reviews.author: MClancy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented from manufacturer.  Could not get a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Still gave three starts because this products looked like it would be great. However, we received our with a big dent on the top corner. The box was intact so it did not appear to happen during shipping. We returned it and asked for a replacement, waited three before finally being told by Amazon they could not get more form the manufacturer. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TopazVonZ

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it twice so far & the temp is extremely difficult to keep stable. I’m able to stabilize it for a few minutes, but then the temp begins to climb. I’ll update my review after I use it a few more times to see if it’s the smoker or me!
customer_reviews.author: Hijinx1812

customer_reviews.title: Wow this is a great smoker.
customer_reviews.text: For me, propane is the way to go. It's cheap enough, mobile, 5 gallon tanks last a very long time, and easy to control the temp. Not as easily as a quality electric unit but still. So far I have smoked chicken, salmon, ribs, and brisket. They've all turned out wonderful. The only reason this gets 4 stars is because it's uninsulated. Controlling the temp isn't always easy, like others have said, especially on windy dates. I think I'm going to pick up some of that reflective gold heat shielding. That should increase the overall temps, allowing me to use less fuel and produce a more consistent product.
customer_reviews.author: Juiblex

customer_reviews.title: Just what I as looking for
customer_reviews.text: It cooks really good, easy to adjust the temp. Powerful flame. I will rate this 4 1/2 Stars because either shelve holder is just to close o the walls or e racks are a bit smalland the fall through sometimes. Will try to add spacers to the rack holders or buy larger racks. Other than that is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Cooking/Smoker Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is FANTASTIC! The best Thanksgiving turkey ever. You can smoke large amounts or small amounts of meat with it.You can cook a small pork roast or two turkeys in it. You can even cook a pizza in it when you don't want to heat up the house with the oven. The only criticism I have is that you can't cold smoke in it. The fire has to be pretty hot in order to get the wood to smoke, so the inside temperature is always hot enough to cook.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sainsbury

customer_reviews.title: Great item if you want a smoker!!! ;)
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's B day so her husband and I went in together and purchased this also the cover. Her husband put it together and didn't take anytime at all. She loves it has done several items and everything has come out excellent!!! Her B day was April 15 so hasn't had it long but she would say if you want a smoker this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for now, but came with pretty noticeable dents in it. For almost $200 I guess I would have thought this would be a bit sturdier. Not sure how long this will last if it came with dents. The box was totally fine so I can’t blame shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Goeden

customer_reviews.title: smoke vault 18"
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I spent a little extra and bought this one,well made and real easy to put together. high quality is definitely their goal. you will want to do a seal around the door. the burner has a low "keep warm" setting at 100* and up to "high" that can go to 450*. I love taking thing to the next level so I got some aluminum sheets and made it double walled on the inside. you don't have to but if you like to smoke year round, it helps (I live in colorado)it's really like an oven you can use outside that allows you to add smoke flavor. yummy!
customer_reviews.author: ryan stoneridge

customer_reviews.title: Temperature issues
customer_reviews.text: Temperature control is very difficult. I smoke in Arizona without much temperature variation and have sealed the doors with heat tape. Still have to babysit to a large degree.
customer_reviews.author: George F

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this smoker for my husband as a gift. He has used it 2 times now and he loves it. It cooks the food perfectly. His first attempt was baby back ribs and second chicken both of which were very good. The only issue was that the temperature gage was broken when we got it. But my husband used an internal temperature gage and the food was perfect. He discussed trying to get a replacement part or just another gage to place in the open air to test the temps but so far so good and so who knows we may just not get one. The broken gage was the only reason why I gave this product 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker takes less gas than I thought to smoke ...
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker takes less gas than I thought to smoke food. The thermometer is not accurate - I purchased a Maverick Wireless digital thermometer so I can read the meat and smoker temps
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sanaker

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This needs constant supervision because the heat fluctuates every fifteen minutes or so even after a thirty minute preheat 😩 otherwise the machine seems to be working well
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Sturdy, well built. Thought that being gas there would be a difference in "smoking" taste! No difference, very good tasting smoked meat and fish!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G. Pesante

customer_reviews.title: Smoker works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good propane smoker. I would have liked a couple more racks and not sure how to order more. The water bowl had a damaged coating--Amazon took some money off the price to compensate because they couldn't deliver a new water bowl. The smoker is excellent for foods smoked at 250-300 F--chicken and ribs. I smoked some fish, but it's a little too hot--dries out the fish before it is well smoked--I'll try some more and try to control the temperature closer to 200 F, but challenge is getting the chips to burn and produce smoke.
customer_reviews.author: David T Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Love it well made.
customer_reviews.text: Been cooking on this unit for a month or so. Love it so far I'm getting a reputation as the grill master. Kinda wishing I got the bigger model. But kinda think it would be gas thirsty. This one is not too bad, I can grill all weekend on a tank.
customer_reviews.author: christopher r gresham

customer_reviews.title: Solid smoker
customer_reviews.text: Major improvement over my last smoker. Temp is constant, I only needed to make a single minor adjustment in the middle of a 6 hour cook. Only complaint is that my kit was missing the two washers for the door handle.
customer_reviews.author: JustN

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. From reading the reviews, I was already aware of the inconsistent temp gauge and the smoke exiting from the door surround. That doesn't bother me as much as it may have for others. It's looks worse than it really is. If there is enough smoke pressured in this box that it has to seep through the doors, then I assure you that there is enough smoke to cover your meat. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gideon

customer_reviews.title: high quality great price great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my new smoker and am quite impressed with the quality of the materials.Past reviews have complained about shipping damage, mine came through pretty good, one small ding on the inside of the door. Had to have been there before it was shipped but it isn't worth bothering with. The knob controlling the heat is too loose and falls off, I got ahold of their customer service dept and they are shipping a new one with no hassle at all.Didn't even ask for any purchase info.Looks like I found a company that appreciates my business.
customer_reviews.author: the waterboy

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck propane smoker - taste for yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I work from home so I use this at least 3 times a month. It's wonderful. I've done whole chickens and turkeys, ribs, lots of pork shoulders and chuck roasts as well as ABTs, and jerky. The flavor in all I've cooked has been awesome and if you get a dual probe thermometer (stick with Maverick brand), you really can't mess it up.
customer_reviews.author: P. Deboer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I started out with a gas-assist smoker from Home Depot. That one was truly cheap and rusted out in no time. The wood burner tray was thin and didn't even last a season. This unit is much better and larger. The racks also fit nicer and are more substantial. As mentioned by others, I sealed the temp gauge with red ATV, which works nice. This unit has a much wider range of temps it can run at than cheaper units too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Munson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible build quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this smoker 3 times and these are the results... Smoker works but the quality of this sucks...
customer_reviews.author: Kpatel

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker for  an every day smoker. Buy it you will be satisfied.😊
customer_reviews.text: Smoked well and the heat is very controlable. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: web feet

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research This has turned out to be a really good one
customer_reviews.author: stacey hansen

customer_reviews.title: Smokin....
customer_reviews.text: Works great and pretty easy to use. I thought the assembly directions were not great but it only took about 30 minutes to assemble. Not real easy to add wood for the smoke tray so put what you want in there in the beginning and you will be ok. There are 3 trays to use and they come out easily and hold plenty of stuff for small party or dinner.
customer_reviews.author: S Dodds

customer_reviews.title: I might have liked it if I could have gotten it together
customer_reviews.text: I might have liked it if I could have gotten it together. It seems as if the holes to put the bolts and screws in were drilled incorrectly so I had everything out starting to put it all together come to the point of the bolts and then the holes didn't match up. UGH! So take what I was able to put together , put everything back into the bags and packaging it came in and box it all back up and return! 2 hours spent on nothing :(
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Live it
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker. Directions said 2 people needed for assembly, I assembled it alone, no problems. Works great. Door closes snugly. No smokes escapes. I see myself using this often !!
customer_reviews.author: cejshopper

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Better than my old smoke hollow - after sealing door with lava rock seal
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing smoker! I've baked a cheesecake
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing smoker! I've baked a cheesecake, a couple different roasts, smoked fished in it...just keep experimenting! The temperature is extremely accurate...
customer_reviews.author: McFarland

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Makes perfect food and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Haven't gotten to use it yet though, as I need to go to a hardware store. The door latch didnt come with the 2 proper nuts to hold it on. Kind of disappointed with that, and the inside of the door was gouged pretty good in 2 spots, also disappointing. I hear good things about this smoker, so I'll give it a 4. Hopefully get to season it this weekend and use it once or twice. Fingers crossed the hardware store has the 2 nuts I need
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to cook meat as well as my electric ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to cook meat as well as my electric did. I would have thought otherwise. I have learned to add more wood to it and stir more occasionally as the direct heat of the fire burns the wood up faster than electric.
customer_reviews.author: Raybo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Hassle-free smoking. About the only minor quip I have is that it is difficult to keep low consistent temperatures. Anything around 220 is good. Anything lower than 200 is difficult. That is partly because the adjustment knob does not allow for fine adjustments in low settings.
customer_reviews.author: EJTV

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my smoker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my smoker. I have smoked numerous meats/fish since receiving, My neighbor says that the smoked chicken I sent over was the best he's ever had. easy to assemble ..the booklet comes with some recipes but I did my research and found some great how to smoke your meats/fish on utube, also found some great brine recipes online also.
customer_reviews.author: KateH

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great little smoker. Able to smoke pretty much anything. Hardly uses up much propane. I've smoked 2 briskets, 4 racks of ribs, 2 whole chickens so far. Plan on using the jerky rack next.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smoker
customer_reviews.text: I got this smoker for my boyfriend's birthday a year ago, and we have probably used it more than 50 times since then. It makes tender, juicy, beautiful pieces of meat. We got a digital thermometer to leave inside the smoker while the meat is cooking so that we get a more accurate temperature reading and this method seems to work like a charm. We just love this smoker and would get it again in a second. Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.author: bananna

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value works perfect. Had a bigger one same brand for 10 years worked great so bought a new one to replace other one.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker; terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: This smoker works great and is a good value. But be prepared to receive a damaged one. The first one I received had obviously been dropped and the door was damaged and would not open. So pay attention when unpacking... you may have to repackage and it may be hard to get everything back in the box. Camp Chef makes great stuff, but they need to wake up and package these better.
customer_reviews.author: RBaker

customer_reviews.title: Keep an eye on the temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Well built, holds smoke well. I didn’t have previous experience with gas smokers so I suffered a little to maintain the temperature steady. Required me to keep constant checking of the smoker to get a good food. First attempt to make smoked ribs was fantastic, tender and tasty
customer_reviews.author: M Pretti

customer_reviews.title: We love this smoker
customer_reviews.text: We love this smoker. Works great and easy to use. So glad we made the decision to purchase this model. Very reasonably priced for someone just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Da bomb
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cooking off grid. You can put wood in to smoke or use it as a bread oven and cook 9 loves of bread at a time. For the price you can't beat it. I would like to see them make a welders blanket or something to put around in winter to keep my heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but door arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Smoker arrived with damaged to door as seen in photos. Didn't want to return item yet had to use it over the weekend. Going to try and get new door or get a discount, Will call Monday. Smoker worked great would of rated 5 stars if product wasn't shipped damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Bill E.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker, easy to use and makes everything taste better. Door handle tends to stick on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: holds a steady temp
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job smoking chicken. Easy to hold a steady temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: The smoker works great on smaller eats like chicken
customer_reviews.text: The smoker works great on smaller eats like chicken, ribs and sausage. It's had to get a good smoke on larger eats like brisket
customer_reviews.author: ladymiss

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and doesn't take up a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Husband, he loves it. Easy to use and doesn't take up a lot of space. Waiting for warmer weather so we can use it more. So far everything has turned out perfect, even when using in below zero temps.
customer_reviews.author: JaiD

customer_reviews.title: smoker review
customer_reviews.text: i love this smoker, it is of superb quality , extremely affordable to operate, this is just a much better option than the cheaper smokers sold in big box stores[masterbuilt] I opted to go propane for instead of electric for a better range of temperarure options. Last but not least, it just looks good. ive also purchased the matching cover to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this smoker! We're not chefs and this makes us feel like we are!! So easy to use
customer_reviews.author: ctw

customer_reviews.title: This smoker is EXCELLENT. The temperature control is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is EXCELLENT. The temperature control is perfect, and meat has come out smokey and perfect every time!
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Great Ribs First time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Easy to use. First time using a smoker and ribs came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smoker for the casual enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Perfect smoker for the casual enthusiast. Easy instructions and assembly. We have never smoked anything before, and this was simple and produced a nice set of ribs! Excited to try smoking it all!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Thurgood

customer_reviews.title: Love love love- my husband is now an expert smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love love love- my husband is now an expert smoker. Best gift I ever got myself I mean him :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker for fair price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and fits most meats for a medium sized family. I would recommend buying more racks also.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: We are so disappointed in this smoker compared to the electric one we ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so excited to purchase this smoker. We read tons of reviews before deciding to buy. However, it has been Very disappointing. We have used it twice and, both times, our meat has been hard on the outside and tough inside. We have tried to cook the meat slow and low temp for hours and we've tried higher temps but same results. Maybe we are doing something wrong. Also, the racks fall out of the slots and the water has to be filled constantly because the pan boils dry very quickly. We are so disappointed in this smoker compared to the electric one we had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Allen

customer_reviews.title: and worked great! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Thanksgiving, and worked great! Easy to assemble, and lots of room for cooking. I smoked 3 chickens, and all turned out great. I was very surprised how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: My second one, wore/rusted out the other one out on the coast, to be expected, great product.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: I really like this smoker
customer_reviews.text: I really like this smoker, have smoked two butts in it. Plan to do some chicken and ribs. Hold heat steady and well. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lgrisha

customer_reviews.title: I liked the write up by amazing ribs
customer_reviews.text: The unit works as well as the writeups say. I liked the write up by amazing ribs.com The bad part was the way it was shipped. The post office claimed it was too heavy, so I had to go to the post office to pick it up. It was 3 more days before I could get there.. Not cool to ship this large unit by USPS.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a first smoker. Overall very nice. Temp can be tricky. I would rebuy it!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Hurst

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. Looking to get something that was well built, easy to assemble, and easy to use. This smoker is great for someone who is looking to smoke weekly or just once in a while. Door is tight fitting, range on burner is good for different temps. Smoked 3 slabs of baby back ribs for 6 hours and turned out the best ever. Great flavor of smoke, meat was super tender, fall off the bone and juicy. Brisket is next for Christmas Day. Highly recommend and have recommended to others already.
customer_reviews.author: slash

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This smoker has made smoking our food a breeze. It took a little bit to get it assembled, but it has been working perfectly since.
customer_reviews.author: PRSparks

customer_reviews.title: 225 all the way
customer_reviews.text: A great solid smoker,my 2nd one..these last for years with many uses..temperature control is outstanding even in Alaska winters recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and works great. Temps can be hard to control but with a little tweaking you’ll get it. Great price and great smoker.
customer_reviews.author: mike searles

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold temperature
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be top of the line, but cannot get this to hold a constant temperature to save my life. Been smoking a 3 pound corned beef for over 6 hours, and nowhere close to the correct internal temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Wobbs

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker I got it for my sons 30th birthday. It does a great job of holding to the temperature that you set it at. Very well built smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad for father’s day and he loves it uses it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Bad igniter. But simple and straight forward.
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Already want a bigger one. Very straight forward, and I like that. Metal is thin and cheap, but holds heat well. Can’t get the igniter to actually light it.
customer_reviews.author: aZing

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker - great smoke flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Works great as described, keeps in the juicy and the smoke favor is just wonderful! I wish it has some locked wheels so you can move it around easier and lock when you want to keep it stationary. Yes, I would recommend this product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: H Tai` Truong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: prompt delivery work as expected no issues with vendor or product
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say I ordered this in March of 2013 and was worried because I read that some people had theirs damaged upon arrival. Either I got lucky or amazon has done a much better job packaging this item. Mine came very secure and not a scratch on it. Looks fantastic in person, even the wife said it looked great (she usually doesn't care much about men's "Toys.") I would highly recommend this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Chrome

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This thing was easy to set up and works fantastic. I've used it every weekend since I bought it. The construction I thought was very good compared to smokers I looked at from 2 different home imporvement stores, and comparing it to a friend of mine's who's burner went bad. I bought an internal thermometer and there is a difference of 20 degrees from the one on the door to the internal..it's not as hot as the door registers. Do yourself a favor and get the extra thermometer and a digital probe thermometer to keep track of meats internal temp.
customer_reviews.author: mikemeboy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in law and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! Best investment, smokes meat to perfection. Professional results, but easy enough for a beginner pit master.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From A to Z This Is A Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: From A to Z this is a great unit. Came double boxed with absolutely no damage. No parts were missing and the unit was easily assembled by 1 person with no help in about 45 minutes. The unit is very handsome, roomy and very very solid. This smoker will last for many many years.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Smoker, But Needs A Better Temperature Gauge
customer_reviews.text: A good smoker for the beginner or the novice. The smoker works great and holds the temperature well, depending on the wind. I have smoked ribs, bacon wrapped sausages, pork tenderloin turkey breast, brisket (no more than 12 lbs.) and cold smoked cheeses with this smoker. Everything has turned out great! However, the temperature gauge was not accurate and would stick, but fortunately I bought and installed the Weber 63028 temperature gauge as a replacement and it now works as expected. Good fit and finish too.
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: This product looks great and smoke like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and smoke like a charm, it arrived right in time for fathers days, and the build was pretty easy, my dad loves it and really brings a lot of smoky flavor to the meat I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah C.

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker for the price point. I did have 1 issue with the gas vent getting rusted and Camp Chef replaced it free of charge. Greta beginner smoker
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love this item for our needs
customer_reviews.text: I love this item for our needs, however now that we have had it for a little while and have used it many times. The temperature gauge on the outside sometimes will not work. It just depends. I guess if you are a smoker this is VERY important, as my husband is the smoker not me and he tells me this. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Bad Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my father on Father's Day and it came damaged, re-ordered and it came damaged again (but a small dent) but we kept it the second time. Works great as a smoker though!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: I like having several shelves. Wish it had rollers to move around easier but its light so not too much trouble to move it. The door has no seals so it smokes a little out the edges of the door but overall I dont think it matters. It sometimes is hard to maintain the heat at a specific temp if your trying to keep it low but you get the hang of it. Would be nice if it had an automatic heat setting but you just have to check on it often.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J Riddle

customer_reviews.title: needs cover for top vent
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Maintains heat perfect. Only four stars because of top vent. No way to keep rain out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hazen

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: My parents love this thing! Everything tastes better! So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item is damaged. Not sure how to contact product ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is damaged. Not sure how to contact product manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Smoker!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smoker, and I have enjoyed it so much! I live in Qatar and we cannot get BBQ anything! It is a real treat for me and my friends to be able to taste "a bit of home". This smoker can hold a lot of meat. I have smoked as many as 4 chickens and a large brisket at the same time. It's really great if you have a big family or like to treat others to great tasting food!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker. Really easy to reach and maintain desired ...
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker. Really easy to reach and maintain desired temperature. Worked perfectly on the first try. A little hard to put together, though.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: ... some turkey breasts and pork butt and it is amazing. No heat loss
customer_reviews.text: We used this to smoke some turkey breasts and pork butt and it is amazing. No heat loss. Easy clean up. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin May

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: Love it just have to follow instructions and food is awsome
customer_reviews.author: matt hall

product_meta.title: Camp Chef Smoke Vault 18"
product_meta.description:
Size:Large
Infuse your meats with delicious mesquite, hickory or any other smoked flavor with the Smoke Vault 18”. This simple system will empower your food with the most appetizing smoked tastes that can’t be experienced any other way. Use the Smoke Vault for a variety of foods from ribs, to salmon and even baked pies or breads. Fully adjustable heat control heat-control dials, three damper valves, and a door thermometer will help you control internal temperatures. Cooking temperatures can vary from 160° F to 400° F. The heavy-gauge steel wood chip tray and water pan create smoke and keep your meats moist. If smoking meats is a new way of cooking to you there is no need to worry; cooking tips, ideas, and recipes are included with this smoker to help you get started. Use the Smoke Vault to lock in your favorite flavors.

Features:

Two adjustable smoking racks 
One jerky smoking rack 
Water pan 
Heavy gauge steel wood chip tray 
Removable porcelain base tray for easy clean up 
Three adjustable damper valves; one on top and one on each side 
Easy to read door thermometer from 50 to 400 degrees 
Convenient matchless snap-ignition 
Cooking tips, ideas, and recipes included 
Protected burner drum for maximum heat control

Specifications:

Body Dimensions (w/out legs): 18" W x 16" D x 30" H 
Total Height (with legs): 44" 
Door Dimensions: 16" W x 28" H 
Cooking Racks Dimensions: 15" W x 14" D 
Total Output: 18,000 BTU/hr 
Maximum Temperature Reading: 400 degrees 
Shipping Dimensions: 19" x 17.5" x 30.5" 
Weight: 65 lbs.
feature_bullets: Three adjustable damper valves; one on top and one on each side
Easy to read door thermometer from 50 to 550 degrees
Cooking tips, ideas, and recipes included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars409 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
